entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GetFolderPath call in Hosting negatively affects startup performance #47269
  • Output caching - support for donut caching #47268
  • Think about how to handle optional `params` arguments in RDG #47266
  • Perf regression: endpoint, multiple_queries, updates #47264
  • Perf improvement: json #47263
  • Make source for QuickGrid samples site public #47261
  • SignalR - Clients Not Receiving Messages in Integration Tests #47260
  • Container publish not functioning in DN8.P2; Worked in DN7 #47259
  • Preserve existing DOM elements when updating statically-rendered content #47258
    8.0-preview4
  • How to configure specific paths for an endpoint different from others? #47257
  • Any plans to add Token generation back into ASP.NET Core #47256
  • Simpler Alternative to WebApplicationFactory ("compose instead of inherit" / no `DeferredHost`) #47255
  • Theme: JS Frontends with .NET Backends #47254
    .NET 8.0
  • Output cache middleware throws when changing AllowCacheStorage on a later stage AND when AllowLocking = true. #47253
  • Refer `ActionResult` and `ActionResult<T>` from Blazor WebAssemly projects #47252
  • Output cache middleware does not vary by query params specified at runtime #47251
  • How to move state from backend to blazor server side #47249
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Negotiate fails at runtime with programs that use System.DirectoryServices.Protocols > 6.0.1 #47248
  • Remove duplicate tests from RDFTests for testing array binding support #47245
    8.0-preview4
  • RDG does not support route handlers that return an anonymous type #47244
    .NET 8 Planning

Closed

  • HttpContext.Response.ContentLength return null (with System.Text.Json) #47127
  • Benchmark stopped running: QueryCompilation #47265
  • .net 7 JwtBearerDefaults.AuthenticationScheme not work with Entity framework core Identity #47119
  • Request timeouts middleware #45732
    8.0-preview3
  • Consider a React Server Components-like Blazor hybrid #29577
    .NET 8 Planning
  • API for registering endpoints that render Razor components. #46350
    8.0-preview3
  • [Design] Blazor United: Layering architecture #46393
    8.0-preview3
  • In the core, why is there only ActionNameAttribute and no ControlNameAttribute #47171
  • [AOT] Clean up gRPC template #46465
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Support parameters bound from an array of types in RequestDelegateGenerator #46785
    8.0-preview3
  • The "ComplexObjectModelBinder" instead of the "ComplexTypeModelBinder" class access type change issue #46775
  • Local build for v6.0.14 on Linux (WSL) is failing on Yarn #46821

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable AOT template tests #47247
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Add area-infrastructure label to wtgodbe's PRs #47262
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution, blog-candidate, 8.0-preview3
  • Update gRPC template to use 2.52.0 #47214
    area-grpc, 8.0-preview3
  • RDG array handling. #47086
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3
  • Remove unnecessary trimming workarounds #47241
    area-security

Updated

  • Ability to monitor Blazor Server circuit activity #46968
    area-blazor
  • Meter factory prototype #46834
    area-runtime, * NO MERGE *
  • Only invoke 'IsService' check once in resolution #47097
    area-runtime
  • Add short circuit in routing #46713
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add SectionName to SectionOutlet and SectionContent #47221
    area-blazor
  • [Web.JS] call mono_wasm_gc_lock in MonoHeapLock #46909
    area-blazor
  • Issue 33368, Solution to resolve "System.InvalidOperationException" inside "HandleForbiddenAsync" method. #47089
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Handle Task/ValueTask.CompletedTask return in RDG #47211
    area-runtime
  • Use IProblemDetailsService in ProblemHttpResult #47100
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play #47209
    area-runtime
